column2: "Abowanohwɛfo no mu nkyekyɛmu nye yi: Korafo no mu; Kore ba Meselemia a ofi Asaf mba mu."
"Na Obed-edom nyaa mbabanyin baawɔtwe. Hɔn awoo ndzidzido ofi abakan do kesi kaaekyir do nye iyi: Semaia

column4: na Peulletai: na Nyankopɔn hyiraa no."

column2: "Na ne ba Semaia so wɔwoo mba maa no a wɔhwɛɛ hɔn egya fie do: na wɔyɛ mbarimba akatakyi a wɔyɛ ndam."

column6: no nuanom wɔyɛ mbarimba a wɔyɛ ndam

column2: "Woyinom nyinara fi Obed-edom ne mba mu: wɔnye hɔn mba na hɔn nuanom
column3: mbarimba akatakyi a wɔwɔ ɔsom mu ahoɔdzen; eduosia ebien a wɔyɛ Obed-edom dze."

column2: "Hosa a ofi Merarimba mu no so nyaa mba; Simri otsitsir

column4: Zekaria tsia anan: Hosa ne mba na no nuanom nyinara wɔyɛ duebiasa."

column3: mbrɛ mbarimba etsitsir no tsetsee; wɔwɔ ɔweɔn edwuma dɛ hɔn nuanom no ara so

column4: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom efi tsetsee

column2: "Na boka afamu tonto no bɔɔ Selemia. Nna ne ba Zekaria a ɔyɛ nyimdzee mu ɔfotunyi no wɔtwee no ho tonto; na ne kyɛfa kedzii kwaamu afamu."
"Na Obed-edom dze wɔ pomu afamu; na ne mba dze nye akoradzedan no."
"Supim na Hosa dze wɔ anee afamu
column5: aweɔmfo no wɔ afa na afa hwɛ enyim."

column3: baanan wɔ kwaamu afamu da kor
column4: baanan wɔ pomu afamu da kor

column2: "Woyinom nye abowanoahwɛfo no hɔn nkyekyɛmu; Korafo mba

column3: Ahija hwɛ Nyankopɔn fie akoradze na akrɔnkrɔndze akoradze no do."
Gerson ne mba no kor; Gersonfo mba wɔyɛ Ladan dze no
column4: egyanom efi mu etsitsir no kor na Gersonnyi Ladan asenyi Jehieli."

column3: na no nua Joel a wɔhwɛ EWURADZE fie akoradze no do."

column2: "na Moses ne ba Gersom ne ba Sebuel na odzi akoradze no do ɔpanyin."
"Na no nuanom; Eliezer dze mu na ne ba Rehabia
column6: na ne ba Selomot fi bae."

column2: "Selomot yi na no nuanom na wodzii akrɔnkrɔndze a ɔhen David
column3: na n’egyanom efi mu etsitsir no
column4: apem apem na ɔha ɔha do asafohen na dɔm do asafohen no yɛɛ no krɔnkrɔn no nyinara akoradze do mpanyin."

column2: "Akodzi mu asadze mu bi na wɔyɛɛ no krɔnkrɔn dɛ wɔdze repempam EWURADZE ne fi no."
"Na ndzɛmba nyinara so a adzehunyi Samuel
column3: na Saul Kish ne ba no
column5: na Joab Zeruia ba yɛɛ no krɔnkrɔn no; obiara n’adze biara a ɔayɛ no krɔnkrɔn no

column2: "Izharfo mu Kenania na ne mba a wɔhwɛ Israel kwasafo edwuma no do

column6: na wɔhwɛ Israel do wɔ Jordan egya anee afamu; wɔ EWURADZE n’edwuma nyinara
column7: na ɔhen no no som afamu."

column4: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom efi mu ebusuasantsen tse. David ahendzi mu afe a otsia eduanan mu na wɔhwehwɛɛ hɔn
column5: na wohun hɔn mu mbarimba akatakyi a wɔyɛ ndam wɔ Jazer a ɔwɔ Gilead."
egyanom efi etsitsir a David dze hɔn sisii Reubenfo
column7: na Manaasɛfo ebusua fa no do
column8: wɔ asɛm biara a ɔfa Nyankopɔn ho
column9: na ɔhen no no ho nsɛm ho."
